feed.title: Track Awesome Seed Rs Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome things related to Seed

entry.title: Awesome Seed Rs Updates on Jan 13 - Jan 19, 2025
entry.content:
Official Resources

  • Homepage

Projects Using Seed

  • benxu.dev/blog (⭐0) - A relatively simple open source personal blog. Built on Seed, maud, Rocket, and Diesel.
  • seed-rs.org - Seed's official website.
  • Typesync - Test your typing speed on song lyrics. Uses Seed, Rocket, and Diesel.
  • Pslink - An URL-shortener page focused on use in publications (demo (user, password: demo)). Uses Seed, actix-web, and sqlx.
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Jan 13 - Jan 19, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Seed Rs Updates on Jan 11 - Jan 17, 2021
entry.content:
Bundlers

  • Trunk (⭐3.9k) - WASM web application bundler for Rust.
  • Web Bundler (⭐11) - Bundles a Seed SPA for publishing.
  • Seeder (⭐43) - Set up Seed app and start dev server by running one command.

Libraries

  • Seed Bootstrap (⭐2) - A collection of the Bootstrap CSS components.

entry.title: Awesome Seed Rs Updates on Dec 02 - Dec 08, 2019
entry.content:
Official Resources

  • GitHub repo (⭐3.8k)

Quickstarts

  • Default quickstart (⭐100) - Contains only Rust libraries.

Examples

  • RealWorld example (⭐127) - "The mother of all demo apps" — Exemplary fullstack Medium.com clone.
  • Official examples (⭐3.8k) - Smaller examples included in official repo.
  • ERWA mytodo (⭐10) - Rust full-stack example. Diesel, Rocket, Seed.
